full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS DREGS PA KUN 'DUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS TSIG @008B NYUNG LA DON CHA TSANG BA TSIGS BCAD DU SDEBS PA 'DI 'DRA ZHIG DGOS ZHES, ,DKON MCHOG BLA MAR 'DZIN CING DAD PA DANG GTONG BA LA SOGS PA DAM PAS BSNGAGS PA'I YON TAN DANG LDAN DUR BED WANG PHUN TSOGS BSAM GRUB KYI DPON MO NOR BU R'A GAS NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR ^KU SA LI DHARMA BADZRA GYIS AOR DU SU WANG GI HO RO'I SGANG THOG TU THUN GCIG LA MGYOGS PAR SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
